Name: [Ether] Scrap Amplifier
Desc: Each point of Anomaly Proficiency increases the Agent's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>0.3%</color>, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>45%</color>.
Desc2: An operational amplifier regulates the cycling speed of the surrounding Ether. As for the malfunctioning ones... they are typically repurposed into wireless speakers.
